short_summary: Purchase, delivery and installation of office furniture
description: Purchased and installed office furniture for Category 2 and Category 5 for a government agency in the National Capital Region.
full_summary:
### National Capital Region Office Furniture Tender

#### Solicitation Information

* **Solicitation Title**: Height Adjustable Work Surface - CFIA (WS4218836114)
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4218836114
* **Closing Date**: December 19, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST

The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) requires the purchase, delivery, and installation of Category 2 and Category 5 office furniture to the National Capital Region.

 Amendments to the solicitation have been made, and interested parties must be logged into their SAP Ariba account to access and download the full Request for Bid (RFB) and attachments.

The selection process will be based on the lowest price. All bids must be submitted by December 19, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST. Late bids will not be accepted.

The contact for this solicitation is Julien (SPAC/PSPC) at annick.julien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

#### Solicitation Details

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

#### Delivery Information

* **Region of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)

#### Contracting Entity Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5
* **Contact**: Julien (SPAC/PSPC) at annick.julien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Clause on Evaluation Criteria
Evaluation will be based solely on the lowest price.

#### Limitations
All submissions shall be in English and must comply with the terms and conditions of the bidding process.

You are required to be logged into your SAP Ariba account to access and download the full Request for Bid (RFB) and attachments.

 Please visit Ariba Discovery for more information: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18168410?extsite=MTgxNjg0MTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
